{"type":"deployment","sha":"2983fced4e0db02d24368e05245097383f47d4f1","repoName":"amb-emilb/workbook-teams-bot","actor":"amb-emilb","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"Fix EasyAuth ARM template configuration using proper Microsoft.Web/sites/config/authsettingsV2 resource

- Remove invalid authSettings from App Service siteConfig
- Add proper Microsoft.Web/sites/config/authsettingsV2 resource as per official Microsoft documentation
- Enable EasyAuth platform with AllowAnonymous global validation
- Configure HTTPS requirement and /.auth API prefix

Resolves ARM deployment error: AppSetting with name 'WEBSITE_AUTH_ENABLED' is not allowed

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>"}
